text: Aliaksandra Sasnovich was the defending champion, but she chose to participate at the 2015 Open Féminin de Marseille instead. Stephanie Vogt won the title, defeating qualifier Andrea Gámiz in the final, 7–6(7–3), 6–4. == Seeds == == Main draw == === Finals === === Top half === === Bottom half === == References == * Main draw Internazionali Femminili di Brescia - Singles
title: 2015 Internazionali Femminili di Brescia – Singles
